other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates no focal or textural abnormalities. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation with the common bile duct measuring up to 3 mm. The main portal vein is patent with appropriate hepatopetal flow. Gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 10 mm. The GB is mildly distended. A calcified gallstone is demonstrated within the gallbladder neck. Negative sonographic sign. No pericholecystic fluid.
